txt.en: 'Knowledge is a never-ending pursuit. In the scholar's guild, we afford the populace that demands our wares what we can while maintaining the greater value of discoveries for the guild alone. As a member, you must understand that some of the secrets and knowledge you possess could easily be twisted to a nefarious purpose. We will not travel that road again. For now, we will supply healers and others with wares they can sell. We ask that you assist in this endeavour.'
Craft a crate of potions for the Umbar Scholar's Guild
The scholar's guild in Umbar Baharbêl supplies potions for healers. They asked that you help meet the demand.
Deliver a crate of potions to the Umbar Scholar's Guild Leader
Crafted a crate of potions for the Umbar Scholar's Guild
Provide the crate of potions to the Umbar Scholar's Guild Leader.
'Most excellent. We will hasten these on to healers throughout the city so that their supplies do not dwindle'
The recipe needed to complete this quest is available for purchase. <rgb=#00f000>Purchase the quest recipe from the guild leader.</rgb>\n\nPack a crate of potions for Umbar Baharbêl.
